column1: English Sent: Such movements have also influenced the evolution of the present landform features of India.
Hindi Tansl: BArawa kI varwamAna sWalAkqwi kA vikAsa BI isa prakAra kI gawiyoM se praBAviwa huA hE.
Anu Translation:  EsI gawi BArawa kI varwamAna lEndPoVrma viSeRawAoM ke vikAsa ko BI praBAviwa_kara cukIM hEM
